duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide T2/T3 level support to end users via remote support tools or through video chat support (Zoom, Google Meets, Slack, Remote Desktop, etc.)
Support business needs by escalating to vendor support when neededSupport procurement and deployment of CreateMe-owned hardware to end-users.
Serve as point of contact for high severity issues/outages/downtime as necessaryCreate and update documentation for end user support
Support CreateMe People team with timely onboarding and offboarding of users from various software platforms as needed.
May be asked to support IT onboarding presentations

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology or related field
